questions.question: Openness: On a scale of 1 to 10, how open are you to new experiences and ideas?
Neuroticism: Rate your ability to handle stress and negative emotions. Is it closer to 1 (calm) or 10 (anxious)?
Conscientiousness: How well do you follow through on tasks and pay attention to details? Rate yourself from 1 (not at all) to 10 (very much).
Agreeableness: Rate your friendliness, cooperativeness, and compassion. Are you closer to 1 (not very) or 10 (very)?
Extraversion: On a scale of 1 to 10, how much do you enjoy social interactions and being around people?
